{cartItems.length ===0? (Cart is empty) : (
You Have {cartItems.length} items in your Cart {cartItems.map(item =>( ))}

} 		{item.price}
Total { cartItems.reduce((a, c) => a + c.price * c.count, 0) } $
) }
); } }
